flex.title: Tasty Pizza
flex.content: It's hot, and succulent at the same time. It's truly a wonderful taste when you take first bite and the sound it makes.

flex.title: Cheesy Burger
flex.content: Crispy seasoned chicken breast, topped with melted cheese, piled onto soft rolls with onion, tomato and garlic mayo.

flex.title: Spicy Shawarma
flex.content: Fiery Chicken Shawarma: slow-roasted for smoky flavor. Packed with a spicy kick and cooled by creamy tahini.
